backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with product, order, translation, user profile, and reference website types plus storage maps and helper view converters.
backend/migration.mo: Migration script initializing the new referenceWebsite field to null.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, involved files, components, and test IDs for reference website admin functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling tokens for the app.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the root React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React router, theme, i18n, and all public/admin routes including the new Reference Website admin page.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAuthC: Admin login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and translation support.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Modal dialog for admin authentication using Internet Identity with login/logout handling and UI copy.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Guards admin routes by checking admin status and showing a login modal or access denied state when needed.
frontend/src/components/i18n/LanguageSel: Shows a modal prompting first‑time users to choose a language and saves their selection.
frontend/src/components/i18n/LanguageSwi: Provides a dropdown menu to switch the current app language.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with navigation, language switcher, and admin login modal.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrderNowD: Displays ordering options for a product, including website checkout and WhatsApp ordering.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Provides an image gallery with navigation, thumbnails, and fallback states for product images.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorStat: Renders an error alert with optional retry action.
frontend/src/components/system/LoadingSt: Shows a centered loading spinner with an optional message.
frontend/src/constants/categories.ts: Defines allowed product categories and helpers for labels and translation keys.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useReferenceWeb: Fetches and saves the reference website configuration via actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useAdminStatus.t: Checks whether the current caller is an admin using actor queries.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useUserProfile.t: Loads and saves the current caller’s user profile through actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/orders/useCreateOrder: Creates a new customer order and handles success or error notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/orders/useOrders.ts: Retrieves orders by status or fetches all orders from the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/orders/useUpdateOrder: Updates an order’s status and refreshes related queries with notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/products/useProductMu: Creates, updates, and deletes products while invalidating product queries and showing toasts.
Fetches products with language-aware transformations and supports category filtering and lookup.
frontend/src/hooks/translations/useLandi: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and update landing‑page translations via the backend actor, auto‑invalidating caches on update.
frontend/src/hooks/translations/useProdu: Defines a mutation hook to update product translations and invalidate the products query.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook managing login, identity state, and error handling via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/i18n/i18n.ts: Defines supported languages, translation data, and helpers for retrieving and storing the current language.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides language state, translation helper, and HTML lang syncing for the app.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and defines light and dark CSS variables for theme colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing navigation cards and reference website info with an external link option.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEditImages: Static admin page placeholder for future image management functionality.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEditTextPa: Admin interface for editing hero text and product translations across languages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminGalleryPag: Placeholder admin page for future gallery management features.
frontend/src/pages/admin/OrderManagement: Displays all orders with loading/error states, tabbed views, and controls to view and update order status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/PlannedFeatures: Shows a list of planned phase‑2 features with titles, descriptions, categories, and a summary of completed phase‑1 work.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ProductManagerP: Provides a full CRUD interface for products, including listing, adding, editing, deleting, and validating product fields.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ReferenceWebsit: Allows admins to view, edit, and save a reference website URL and notes with persistence and validation.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements the checkout form, validates user input, creates orders, and displays loading or error states.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information with an embedded Google Map and external map link using translations.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing hero section with translated text and category links using cards.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed product info including images, pricing, stock, description, and an order dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ProductListPage.tsx: Lists products with category filtering, loading and error states, and product cards with basic details.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters and session-based persisted parameters.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Contains validation functions for required fields, mobile numbers, pincodes, quantities, prices, and stock values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended color system using CSS variables, custom animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, goals, issues, and feature list for phased development of an agricultural shop app with admin UI, multilingual support, and design constraints.
